description:
This mini-course provides extensive coverage of how database views can be
created, used, and updated; introduces standard techniques for authorization
in relational databases. It will be available for an extended period of time.
We anticipate the content will be available at least until June 9th, 2015. You
will be notified by email of any changes to content availability beforehand.

We have created 14 mini-courses that can be assembled in a variety of ways to
learn about different aspects of databases. Please visit the main Databases
page for suggested pathways and general information, or click View Courseware
above to begin this mini-course.
title: Views and Authorization
